sentence.Network_en: Lustre is the integral effect of reflection and diffraction.
sentence.Network_cn: 色泽是反射和衍射的综合效果.

sentence.Network_en: Evidently diffraction, as well as interference, is a wave property.
sentence.Network_cn: 显然,衍射以及干涉是波特性.

sentence.Network_en: The diffraction method is appreciably lower than that of the spectroscopic method.
sentence.Network_cn: 衍射法的精确度显然低于光谱法的精确度.

光的衍射（Diffraction）指光在传播路径中，遇到障碍物或小孔（狭缝）时，偏离直线绕过障碍物继续传播的现象。光经过圆形口径后 …

list.abs: 衍射光栅(diffraction grating)是光栅的一种。它通过有规律的结构,使入射光的振幅或相位(或两者同时)受到周期性空间调制。衍射光栅在光学上的最重要应用是作为分光.

auth_sentence.content: X-ray diffraction and spectral analysis revealed both Thulium and Rhenium.

auth_sentence.content: Now this diffraction pattern, as it's called, shows us two things.

auth_sentence.content: But with that out of the way, Curiosity accomplished another first: the first-ever use of X-ray diffraction on another planet.
